data.name: Spelldash
data.detailed_description:
Spelldash is a fast-paced 3D platformer where you use elemental spells and environment to run through levels

Use environmental elements like jumpers, jump pads, wallrunning, speed pads, rocket jump pads, bubble jumps and more to traverse the levels quickest and most creative way possible

Use fire, air, ice and lightning elements, all with unique spells to eliminate enemies

Features

  • Fast paced, intense parkour action
  • Unique campaign, collectathon and challenge modes
  • Collectibles to unlock new endings for the story
  • Open ended levels that can be completed in many ways
  • 4 different elemental spells to eliminate enemies
  • Many different abilities to traverse the levels in different ways
  • Stylized environments
  • Global leaderboards

data.short_description: Spelldash is a hardcore FPS speedrunning game where you kill enemies and use environmental elements like walls, jump pads, barrels and more to reset your double jump and dash to traverse the levels freely.
